text:
Hattie Gladwell for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 28 Feb 2017 12:36 pm (Picture: Instagram) 
24-year-old Megan Jayne Crabbe is a body positivity advocate from Essex, who runs the Instagram account bodyposipanda. 8 things you'll only understand if you take medication for your mental health

But when Megan, who had suffered from anorexia as a teen, recently uploaded a side-by-side shot of her when she was suffering, against her now, happy and carefree, the comments, which were filled with love and congratulations, also had some dark spots of hatred amongst them.
